source_tweets.title: Multiple Earthquake reports in Afghanistan, near Mazar-e Sharif
source_tweets.description: 7 reports of earthquake activity

source_tweets.text:
Magnitude-6.3 earthquake kills at least 20 people in Afghanistan

The US Geological Survey said the quake hit at a depth of 28km near Mazar-e Sharif, a city of around 523,000 people famous for its shrines and historic sites [â€¦]
source_tweets.author: publicnewsfeed.mastodon.social.ap.brid.gy

source_tweets.text:
UNCAPTIONED: At Least 20 Dead After 6.3-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Northern Afghanistan

flip.it/_75JtB
Hopefully all the dead are taliban scum
source_tweets.author: bunnyw999.bsky.social

source_tweets.text:
#Afghanistan #Earthquake #Disaster #Rescue #SeismicActivity #climate #anomaly #climatecrisis #destruction
ðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡« Aftermath of the Powerful Earthquake in Northern Afghanistan

ðŸ’” According to the Ministry of Health, more than 20 people have been confirmed dead, and at least 534 have been injured.
source_tweets.author: tali-deu.bsky.social

source_tweets.text:
Afghans dig through rubble after earthquake kills at leastÂ 27

A boy sits next to his damaged house, in the aftermath of an earthquake, in Samangan province, Afghanistan, November 4, 2025.â€” Reuters Quake leaves almost 1,000 injured, destroys several buildings. Poor infrastructure causes â€œimmenseâ€â€¦
source_tweets.author: 10bmnews.bsky.social

source_tweets.text:
Another earthquake has struck Afghanistan. Our hearts are with all affected. 

Afghan womenâ€”already restricted from aid, health care, and workâ€”suffer most under Taliban rule. 

Gender apartheid amplifies every disaster. 

Learn more: righttolearn.ca/earthquakes-...
source_tweets.author: righttolearn.ca

source_tweets.text: Survivors of a powerful earthquake in northern Afghanistan are digging through the rubble of their homes after spending a bitterly cold night outdoors.
source_tweets.author: apnews.com

source_tweets.text: #Afghan   #Afghanistan   #earthquake
source_tweets.author: toppnews.bsky.social

source_tweets.title: A 6.3 magnitude earthquake struck Mazar-e-Sharif, killing at least 20 people and
source_tweets.description: A 6.3 magnitude earthquake struck Mazar-e-Sharif, killing at least 20 people and injuring over 600, dating back to the 15th century Blue Mosque was affected

source_tweets.text:
Article:
The Blue Mosque of Mazar-e-Sharif which dates back to the 15th century was affected by the earthquake. At least 20 people were killed and more than 600 were injuredâ€¦The powerful 6.3 magnitude earthquake struck just before dawn on Monday.
source_tweets.author: weather.observer

source_tweets.text:
There is an elevated risk of wildfire spread today, especially in southeast PA. 
Avoid any outdoor burning
Do not casually discard cigarette butts & matches
Be careful with equipment that may cause sparks
#WildfireSafetyPA #PAwx
